decks.notes: This deck focuses on quickly deploying aggressive, evasive threats like Delver of Secrets, Dragon's Rage Channeler, and Murktide Regent while disrupting the opponent with countermagic like Force of Will and Daze. The deck also includes efficient removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Unholy Heat to clear the way for the aggressive creatures. The deck aims to apply pressure early and maintain tempo throughout the game, using cantrips like Brainstorm and Ponder to find the necessary cards to stay ahead. Manabase includes fetch lands to optimize color fixing and Wasteland to disrupt the opponent's mana base.

The deck focuses on utilizing Mystic Forge and various key artifacts such as Voltaic Key, Manifold Key, and Urza's Workshop to generate powerful combos and interactions. Karn, the Great Creator and Tezzeret, Cruel Captain provide additional synergy and utility. The deck aims to ramp up mana quickly with cards like Lotus Petal and Ancient Tomb to play out its artifacts efficiently. With a mix of control elements like Pithing Needle and removal spells like Kozilek's Command, the deck can disrupt opponents while assembling its combo pieces for a strong finish.

The main concept of this deck is to cast a large number of spells quickly to bring out key combo pieces such as Thassa's Oracle and Narcomoeba, in order to win the game before the opponent has a chance to react. By utilizing cards like Lotus Petal, Dark Ritual, and Simian Spirit Guide, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a chain of spells that ultimately leads to a game-ending combo. The inclusion of cards like Pact of Negation and Cabal Therapy help protect and disrupt the opponent's strategy, ensuring a swift victory for the player piloting this deck.

The main idea of this deck is to quickly fill your graveyard with combo pieces using cards like Balustrade Spy and Undercity Informer, then use them to win the game in one explosive turn by casting Dread Return on Thassa's Oracle. The deck includes a variety of fast mana sources and ways to protect your combo with Pact of Negation. Memory's Journey and Jack-o'-Lantern are used to prevent yourself from milling out, while Poxwalkers can help disrupt your opponent's game plan. Bridge from Below provides additional value when your creatures are sacrificed.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize the combination of Mystic Forge with artifact cards and mana acceleration to generate a powerful advantage and overwhelm the opponent quickly. The deck focuses on playing multiple artifacts quickly, utilizing key cards like Voltaic Key and Basalt Monolith to create mana efficiently, while also benefiting from cards like Paradoxical Outcome to draw cards and gain tempo. The goal is to assemble a strong board presence and disrupt the opponent's strategy while setting up for a decisive win using powerful artifacts like The One Ring and Ugin, Eye of the Storms.

The main focus of this deck is to disrupt the opponent's resources and strategy through a combination of hand disruption cards like Thoughtseize, resource denial with cards like Smallpox and Wasteland, and graveyard recursion with Life from the Loam. The deck also has a variety of threats that can quickly close out the game, such as Hogaak, Arisen Necropolis and Barrowgoyf. The deck aims to control the board state and grind out incremental advantages until it can overpower the opponent. It also utilizes Urza's Saga to tutor for key artifacts that can further disrupt the opponent's game plan.

This deck focuses on quickly putting powerful creatures into play from the graveyard, using reanimation spells like Reanimate and Kaito, Bane of Nightmares. The deck includes disruptive spells like Thoughtseize and Force of Will to protect the combo, while also including card draw and manipulation with cards like Brainstorm and Ponder. Additionally, there are some versatile threats like Snapcaster Mage and Wan Shi Tong, Librarian to provide additional value. The mana base is built to support a variety of colors necessary for the deck's spells and creatures.

This Dimir Tempo deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's game plan with a combination of hand disruption spells like Thoughtseize, countermagic like Force of Will, and removal spells like Fatal Push. It also leverages efficient threats like Murktide Regent and Brazen Borrower to apply pressure while maintaining tempo advantage. The deck's mana base is optimized for consistency and provides access to powerful dual lands like Underground Sea. The goal is to control the game early on, disrupt the opponent's strategy, and close out the game quickly with a mix of efficient threats and disruptive spells.

The main idea of this UWx Control deck is to control the game by using counterspells, removal spells, and card draw to outvalue the opponent. It focuses on card advantage and disruption, utilizing cards like Force of Will, Swords to Plowshares, and Brainstorm to maintain control of the game. The deck also includes win conditions like Thundertrap Trainer and Flame of Anor to close out the game once it has stabilized. By controlling the board and outmaneuvering the opponent, this deck aims to grind out a victory through careful resource management and strategic play.

This Legacy UR Aggro deck focuses on utilizing efficient spells and aggressive creatures to disrupt the opponent's game plan and close out the game quickly. The deck includes powerful cantrips like Brainstorm and Ponder to dig for threats, along with countermagic like Force of Will to protect key cards. Lightning Bolt and Murktide Regent provide consistent damage, while Wasteland and Daze disrupt the opponent's mana base. Dragon's Rage Channeler and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student provide card advantage and further pressure. Overall, the deck aims to apply pressure early and maintain it throughout the game.

This Dimir Tempo deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's game plan while gaining incremental advantages through efficient spells and creatures. By combining disruptive cards like Thoughtseize and Daze with powerful creatures like Delver of Secrets and Murktide Regent, the deck aims to control the board and pressure the opponent quickly. The deck's low curve and versatile removal spells like Fatal Push allow it to adapt to different matchups and maintain tempo advantage. With a mix of disruption, card advantage, and aggressive threats, this deck aims to outpace and outmaneuver the opponent in Legacy 1 vs 1 matches.

The deck aims to quickly fill the graveyard with creatures and then use powerful spells like Dread Return to combo off and win the game in a single turn. By utilizing cards like Balustrade Spy and Undercity Informer to mill the entire library, the deck can trigger a win condition like Thassa's Oracle to secure victory. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Pact of Negation and Cabal Therapy to protect the combo and disrupt opponent's plans. The key strategy is to quickly assemble the combo pieces and execute a game-winning sequence.

The main goal of this deck is to quickly fill the graveyard with powerful creatures like Archon of Cruelty, Griselbrand, and Atraxa, Grand Unifier, then bring them back onto the battlefield with cards like Reanimate, Animate Dead, and Shallow Grave. To help achieve this goal, the deck includes cards like Faithless Looting, Lotus Petal, and Dark Ritual to quickly cycle through the deck and get the necessary resources. The strategy combines fast mana acceleration with graveyard recursion to overwhelm the opponent with massive creatures early in the game.

The main concept of this UR Aggro deck is to consistently apply pressure on the opponent by using efficient and cheap threats like Dragon's Rage Channeler, Delver of Secrets, and Murktide Regent. The deck also aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan with counterspells like Daze and Force of Will, while also dealing direct damage with Lightning Bolt. The deck utilizes cantrips like Ponder, Preordain, Mishra's Bauble, and Brainstorm to ensure consistency and card selection. Additionally, the deck runs land destruction with Wasteland to further disrupt the opponent's mana base.

This UR aggro deck focuses on quickly deploying threats like Delver of Secrets, Dragon's Rage Channeler, and Murktide Regent to apply pressure on the opponent. The deck also includes powerful disruption spells like Daze, Force of Will, and Lightning Bolt to control the game and protect its creatures. With a mix of card advantage through cantrips like Ponder and Mishra's Bauble, along with land disruption from cards like Wasteland, this deck aims to maintain its aggressive tempo and overwhelm the opponent before they can stabilize.

The main concept of this deck is to disrupt the opponent's strategy while quickly deploying threats to apply pressure. The deck contains a variety of hand disruption spells, such as Inquisition of Kozilek and Thoughtseize, to disrupt the opponent's game plan. It also includes countermagic like Force of Will and Daze to protect its own threats. The deck aims to control the board with removal spells like Fatal Push and tempo plays with cards like Brazen Borrower, while closing out the game with powerful threats like Murktide Regent and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student.
